plot: Marshall Antonio Carotenuto is sent to Sagliena, an imaginary little village in the center of Italy in the 50s, to assume his new mandate. In the village he knows Mariella (Frisky) AKAS 'la Bersagliera' secretly fallen in love for a policeman (Carabiniere) reporting to Antonio. But also Paolina, the village's priest nephew, loves him. Things become more complicated when Annarella, the midwife, start demonstrating his love to Antonio. She is hiding a secret and the Marshall soon will be in a restless situation.   Written by  1felco
title: Pan, amor y fantasia

cast.role: Maria Antonia De Ritis, madre de la 'Bersagliera'
cast.name: Vittoria Crispo
